pull.title: gui: send amount placeholder value
pull.body:
Noticed that there wasn't a default value for the send amount. However if you put a value in or click the up and down arrows you're unable to get it blank again, so it makes sense that it has a default value. I hope this also makes it more clear that users can send less than 1 BTC if it shows the 8 decimal places

PR:
![Capture](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46864828/67132088-549c6180-f1ff-11e9-9ba5-67fdcd6db894.PNG)

events.body: NACK. I prefer the blank field, as it allows for pasting amounts (which is very common when doing currency conversions and such, or to paste the exact amount from orders).
Maybe use `setPlaceholderText`? (though be careful: the number of decimals would depend on the configured unit)

events.message: Send amount shows minimum amount placeholder

events.body:
I've attempted that now. Hope it's okay!

PR:
![1](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46864828/67145180-222e4b00-f277-11e9-949b-6a1e7f924379.PNG)
![2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46864828/67145181-222e4b00-f277-11e9-9b33-a1f6c8c586ec.PNG)
![3](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46864828/67145182-222e4b00-f277-11e9-9153-1f8fb41a0e1b.PNG)
![4](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/46864828/67145183-22c6e180-f277-11e9-8ea5-bd2f6c14444c.PNG)

rename.from: gui: a default send amount value

events.body: ACK - placeholder text makes complete sense here.
@laanwj You just need to do one click more to select the whole text and then you can just replace it (at least on most systems).

ACK 57e2edea0bfea664e3f12dad2508139eb7f461bc, this is a surprisingly compact solution too

> @laanwj You just need to do one click more to select the whole text and then you can just replace it (at least on most systems).

quick, patent Only One More Click :tm: payments

>@laanwj You just need to do one click more to select the whole text and then you can just replace it (at least on most systems).

Pasting an amount to an empty field is a single middle click, nothing more.

Replacing text would be a double-click (maybe triple on some systems?), then Ctrl-V on the keyboard. Significantly more complicated.

issue.title: Bitcoin PR tracking
issue.body: The main purpose of this issue is to keep track of Pull Requests on Bitcoin since version 0.19.1 identifying those which make a porting LitecoinZ.
